abilities.desc: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo

abilities.desc: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.notes: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

abilities.desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 200 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.notes: Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.

abilities.desc: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in with Viscous Nasal Goo and stacks of Quill Spray.
abilities.name: Hairball

abilities.desc: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
abilities.name: Warpath
